0.name: Gourmet Salt Water Taffy - Bulk
0.desc:
No one can resist the smooth texture and mouthwatering flavor of classic saltwater taffy! This nostalgic delight emerged from Atlantic City, NJ to become one of the most popular confections in the world. Often used in wedding favors or given as a special gift, saltwater taffy is sure to please any sweet tooth! Each individually wrapped piece includes rich molasses, sea salt and palm oil to produce that creamy taste experience that has everyone reaching for a second piece, or even a third and fourth!Saltwater taffy comes in a long list of delicious flavors, each featuring its own unique color. The many pastel hues, like yellow, pink and orange, harken back to this candy's seaside origins. You'll love sampling each distinct flavor, like caramel swirl or root beer float! Nothings better than a stroll along the boardwalk with watermelon or raspberry saltwater taffy. Explore our flavor list today and discover your new favorite beach snack!

Choose from over 60 different flavors or mixes. When all flavors and mixes are available, there are more than 60 to choose from. The Assorted Taffy mix contains about 15 flavors.

1.name: Sour Patch Kids Assorted - 5lb
1.desc: You'll be puckering up for a long, long time with this bulk bag of Sour Patch Kids. With a tart, sugary bite followed by a sweet reprieve, it's no wonder why they're one of America's favorite candies. First sour and then sweet these little trouble makers will wreak havoc on your mouth in the most delicious way possible. In green lime, lemon yellow, orange, and red raspberry, there's a flavor for every sour-lover. Bring them to a sporting event for a tasty snack or try them in a glass of lemonade. With hours of tartness in every pack, you'll be all puckered out!

2.name: Assorted Salt Water Taffy Mix - 5lb
2.desc: Assorted salt water taffy mix. Do you remember those amazing trips to the beach with your family when you were a kid? Vacation was never complete without a trip to the candy store and a big bag of salt water taffy. Bring those great memories to life in your mouth any time you like with these assorted salt water taffy candies. Set them out in a candy dish at home or work and share the sweet experience.

3.desc: Don't be such a square! Unless you want to be a delicious, creamy Caramel Square. Caramel has been around for centuries and transforms typical granulated sugar into this famous form of ooey, gooey chewiness when heated at a high heat. We'd like give the culinary geniuses who came up with this fantastic candy a pat on the back!

9.name: Banana Salt Water Taffy - 2.5lb

Salt water taffy is going to make you feel great about yourself anyway, because it provides a person with a bit of nostalgia. There is no other treat which screams about summer more than salt water taffy.
